2_0_0100010163040055: The software you are now using was produced through the efforts of many people: designers, artists, programmers, musicians, and lots of other hard-working folks.
2_1_010001026300b51e: If you make copies of this software for any reason other than to make a personal backup, you are not only breaking the law, but raising the cost of software for all legitimate users.  PLEASE DO NOT MAKE ILLEGAL COPIES OF THIS GAME!
2_2_01000103631d0100: Oh, by the way . . .  You will need the information contained in the printed documentation to successfully complete this game.  In other words, it's not just the law . . . It's a good idea.
